synopsis.text: South Seas adventure meets space exploration in this unique anime tale. High school student Yukari Morita embarks on a personal quest to the Solomon Islands, hoping to locate her missing father who vanished during his honeymoon. In an unexpected turn of events, she crosses paths with the Solomon Space Agency (SSA) and its director, Isao Nasuda. Desperate to find her father, Yukari accepts a part-time job with the SSA, becoming an astronaut in exchange for their help. Due to her petite stature and light weight, she becomes a crew member of Japan's first manned spaceship. As Yukari's journey unfolds, she discovers that her future holds more surprises than she ever imagined. Join Yukari as she navigates the challenges of space travel and uncovers the truth about her father's disappearance.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
